sentences.english: Cracks have appeared on the dam's surface and workshops at the site have collapsed .
sentences.chinese: 紫坪鋪水壩的表面出現了裂紋，周圍的工場也已坍塌。

sentences.english: The vine still clings to the moldering wall.
sentences.chinese: 藤蘿依舊纏繞坍塌的牆垣。

sentences.english: Dozens of students were killed when the Juyuan Middle School collapsed in Dujiangyan.
sentences.chinese: 許多學生在都江堰聚源中學的坍塌中喪生。

sentences.english: Were we in a tin cup on top of a busted rampart.
sentences.chinese: 我們是否在坍塌牆頂的一隻錫杯中呆過。

sentences.english: The warehouse manager attributed the collapse to a big temperature difference.
sentences.chinese: 糧庫管理者稱，糧倉坍塌原因是”溫差過大”。

sentences.english: But when he got there, the road weakened by the heavy rain just collapsed under him.
sentences.chinese: 但是當他開上去時，這條被雨水破壞了的路就坍塌了。

sentences.english: The northern flank of the mountain collapsed, producing the largest landslide in recorded history.
sentences.chinese: 山峯的北坡坍塌了，這是美國史上最大規模的山崩。

sentences.english: That appears for the first time after the fall of the Mycenaeans.
sentences.chinese: 這種建築在邁錫尼文明社會坍塌之後第一次出現。

sentences.english: The Ben Ali regime, twenty-three years old, collapsed in a few weeks.
sentences.chinese: 二十三歲的本阿里政權，在幾個星期內坍塌。

sentences.english: Cracks have appeared on the dam’s surface and workshops at the site have collapsed.
sentences.chinese: 大壩的表面有裂痕，而且那個地方的廠房已經坍塌。

sentences.english: thorns had come up everywhere, the ground was covered with weeds, and the stone wall was in ruins.
sentences.chinese: 荊棘長滿了地皮，刺草遮蓋了田面，石牆也坍塌了。

sentences.english: Used with our down-hole hammer, it can drill through complicated formations in which drilling holes are easy to collapse.
sentences.chinese: 配合我廠生產的潛孔錘，可以鑽穿複雜，易坍塌底層。

sentences.english: The bridge broke down in last earthquake.
sentences.chinese: 那座橋在上次地震中坍塌了。

sentences.english: Well, do you remember how the school collapsed?
sentences.chinese: 那你還記得咱們坍塌的學校嗎？

sentences.english: Dust, smoke and debris fill the air asone of the World Trade Center towers in New York City collapses in thisSeptember 11, 2001 photo.
sentences.chinese: 北塔坍塌時空氣中充滿了粉塵，煙以及碎片。

definition: to collapse (of building, dam or bridge)
talus slide/to crumble (of scree slope)/to collapse/landslide
to rupture/to burst open/to break up
